thread.section_title: LegacyHeadstones.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LegacyHeadstones.com | legacyheadstones.com
thread.title: Sharon Dorsey

author: Sharon Dorsey
title: Sharon Dorsey
text: I was not able to purchase a headstone at the time of my mother's passing. Recently I goggled "headstones" and found the Legacy Headstones site. The pricing was much better than I anticipated. I was able to complete some of the the information, but encountered some difficulty and contacted customer service. The customer service rep was professional and added a personal touch when she answered my questions. The headstone was delivered last week, was packaged well and it is BEAUTIFUL! The quality of the work is outstanding and I would recommend Legacy Headstones to anyone. Thank you!!!
